attributes.action: Commission a public enquiry into the waste of public funds caused by the suspension and subsequent re-instatement and acquittal of 14 Prison Officers at HMP Pentonville.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 14 Prison Officers were suspended on suspicion of trafficking illicit items into HMP Pentonville. They were suspended on full pay at great cost to the tax payer. Their suspension forced part of the prison to be closed at great cost to the tax payer. Two were charged and convicted then had the convictions overturned on appeal the other 12 have now been re-instated and paid compensation at further cost to the tax payer. Please commission a public enquiry to find out who allowed to happen and to restore public faith in the work of HM Prison Officers.
